reporter-output.line: STEP 1
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
STEP 2 and 3
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Enter 'defed2b6b31d480' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Draft' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post defed2b6b31d480 has been created.' is present.
STEP 4
Click the 'Schedule' link in the work bench.
Switch to the active frame titled 'defed2b6b31d480 dialog'.
Click the 'Add Scheduled Revision' link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'defed2b6b31d480 dialog'.
STEP 5
Select revision titled 'defed2b6b31d480'.
Verify that the 'Operation' option count equals '5'.
Select 'Moderate to Published' from the 'Select operation' drop down list.
STEP 6
Enter '10/10/2014' in the 'Date' text box.
Enter '07:15 PM' in the 'Time' text box.
STEP 7
Click the 'Schedule' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'defed2b6b31d480 dialog'.
Verify success message of 'The scheduled revision operation has been saved' is present.
STEP 8
Verify the scheduled text 'defed2b6b31d480' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text 'Moderate to Published' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text '10/10/2014 - ' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the 'Run now' link is present for content item 'defed2b6b31d480' with action 'Moderate to Published'.
Verify the 'Cancel' link is present for content item 'defed2b6b31d480' with action 'Moderate to Published'.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
STEP 9
Click the 'Content' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Content dialog'.
Enter title futurePost10/10/2014.
Click the 'Apply' button.
Get the text of the first search result set item.
Click the first search title link in the search result set.
Verify the text 'Revision state: Published' is present in the work bench info block.
Verify the text 'Public: Yes' is present in the work bench info block.
STEP 10
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Enter '90daa1c8b42c4f9' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Draft' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post 90daa1c8b42c4f9 has been created.' is present.
Click the 'Schedule' link in the work bench.
Switch to the active frame titled '90daa1c8b42c4f9 dialog'.
Click the 'Add Scheduled Revision' link.
Switch to the active frame titled '90daa1c8b42c4f9 dialog'.
Select revision titled '90daa1c8b42c4f9'.
Select 'Moderate to Published' from the 'Select operation' drop down list.
Enter '10/10/2014' in the 'Date' text box.
Enter '07:19 PM' in the 'Time' text box.
Click the 'Schedule' button.
Switch to the active frame titled '90daa1c8b42c4f9 dialog'.
Verify success message of 'The scheduled revision operation has been saved' is present.
Switch to the active frame titled '90daa1c8b42c4f9 dialog'.
Verify the scheduled text '90daa1c8b42c4f9' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text 'Moderate to Published' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text '10/10/2014 - ' is present in the scheduled queue.
Click the 'Run now' link for content item '90daa1c8b42c4f9' with action 'Moderate to Published'.
STEP 11
Switch to the active frame titled '90daa1c8b42c4f9 dialog'.
Verify the scheduled text '90daa1c8b42c4f9' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text 'Moderate to Published' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text '10/10/2014 - ' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text 'Completed' is present in the scheduled queue.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.

Switch to the active frame titled '82744f275281416 dialog'.

Click the 'Cancel' link for content item '82744f275281416' with action 'Moderate to Published'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Are you sure you want to cancel this scheduled revision? dialog'.
Click the 'Confirm' button.
Switch to the active frame titled '82744f275281416 dialog'.

Verify the text 'Moderate to Published' is NOT present on the page.

Select 'Moderate to Published' from the 'Select operation' drop down list.
Enter '10/11/2014' in the 'Date' text box.
Enter '07:16 PM' in the 'Time' text box.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post f02a68ead0544a2 has been created.' is present.
Verify success message of 'f02a68ead0544a2 has been scheduled to Moderate to Published on 10/11/2014 - ' is present.
Click the 'Schedule' link in the work bench.
Switch to the active frame titled 'f02a68ead0544a2 dialog'.
Verify the scheduled text 'f02a68ead0544a2' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text 'Moderate to Published' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text '10/11/2014 - ' is present in the scheduled queue.
Click the 'Run now' link for content item 'f02a68ead0544a2' with action 'Moderate to Published'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'f02a68ead0544a2 dialog'.
Verify the scheduled text 'f02a68ead0544a2' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text 'Moderate to Published' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text 'Completed' is present in the scheduled queue.
